body: Agree with Adam - using `->insert` checks against schema. This could easily get broken in a hard to understand way if the schema changes and we are not using insert.
body_html: Agree with Adam - using ->insert checks against schema. This could easily get broken in a hard to understand way if the schema changes and we are not using insert.
body_text: Agree with Adam - using ->insert checks against schema. This could easily get broken in a hard to understand way if the schema changes and we are not using insert.
